Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with original case in very good condition, signed checklist and cream pick guard. Pick guard never been installed Overall condition: - Guitar is in very good to excellent condition - Frets are in very good condition - Neck is straight and all electronics work as they should. - No structural damage - Surfaces scratches and a few small bumps on the back of the body - Edgewear around the body and the headstock More pictures available upon request Specifications: - Weight: 9 lbs 4 oz - 60' neck profile - Non chambered one piece body - AA Flame top - EMG pickups (original pickups not included in the sale) - Rosewood fretboard - Kluson tuners - Top hat knobs with pointers Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
